welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Francofonte, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to discover all the beauty and culture this city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a valid military or civilian ID is required to access the network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fontanarossa Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fontanarossa Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours by providing their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Comiso Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
